players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We need to figure out who did this. Does anyone have any information that might help us identify the killer?"
Diana: "I agree with Bob, we need to find out who did this to Charlie. I have no information to share at the moment but I will keep an open mind and listen carefully to what others have to say."
You: "I believe we should focus our investigation on Bob, given that he was the last one to interact with Charlie before his death."

Bob: "Alice, that's a baseless accusation! I was just as shocked as everyone else to find Charlie dead. Your quick attempt to pin this on me without any real evidence makes me suspicious of you instead."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
